text:
There are some use cases (Async Soap WS) where an empty response is an OK response, so an option should be added to allow for that.

See:
- http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12571328/call-an-async-fire-and-forget-soap-webservice-with-jmeter/
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text: Fixing this requires fixing 53995 before, otherwise an empty non 200 status answer could be considered as a good one.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Fixing this requires fixing 53995
54006 not 53995

 before, otherwise an empty non 200 status
> answer could be considered as a good one.
Soap Sampler is deprecated as of upcoming version JMeter 2.9
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
